DOC.brief_summary: Patients on oral anticoagulants need rapid reversal of the anticoagulant effect in case of acute bleeding or emergency surgery. Prothrombin Complex Concentrates are known to provide a fast reversal of the anticoagulant effect, with several advantages over alternatives like vitamin K or FFP.The planned clinical Phase III study is designed to provide clinically relevant data on efficacy and safety.
DOC.brief_title: Prothrombin Complex Concentrate for Anticoagulant Reversal
DOC.criteria: Key Subjects on oral anticoagulation requiring rapid reversal due to acute bleeding or emergency surgery INR > 2 at baseline Key Acute thromboembolic event Treatment with any other investigational drug in the last 30 days before study entry Less than 2 weeks of stable oral anticoagulation
